channel.title: Integrations on Fluid Player Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Integrations on Fluid Player Documentation

item.title: Integration
item.description: Quick Integration Note We have recently launched our new Fluid Player Builder. Use the Builder to customise your player for the easiest integration yet! In order to set Fluid Player, three things are required: The Javascript and CSS files of the player; An HTML5 <video> tag; A single Javascript line of code that attaches the player to the video tag. <html> <head> <title>Fluid Player</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.
